Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the body of a pale red-brown pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of at least two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:32-33/P41.5/106 (larger fragment) TA:32-33/P41.5/112 (smaller fragment)
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394028) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394028)
